醔醔醔

醔字的基本解释

醔
qiú
酒官。

醔
chōu
滤（酒）。

醔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《集韻》字秋切，平尤，從。］
同“酋1”。
酒官。
[②]［chōu］
［《廣韻》楚鳩切，平尤，初。］
同“篘1”。
出酒，取酒。

醔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醔； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1285第26
【集韻】將由切，音湫。酒官。本作酋，亦作?。　又慈秋切，音酋。義同。

醔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醔字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
qiú
Wine officer.
Glutinous rice
chōu
Filter (wine).
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Jiyun" Qiqie, Pingyou, Cong. ]
Same as "Chief 1".
Wine officer.
[②]［chōu］
["Guangyun" Chu Jiuqie, Pingyou, Chu. ]
Same as "篘1".
Take out the wine, take the wine.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醔; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1285 Page 26
[Jiyun] will be by Qi, Yinqiu. Wine officer. This is for the chieftain, also for ?.　Ziqiuqi again, Yinchi. The same meaning.
Glutinous rice
